122290000.text: {NICKNAME}, do you remember why we came to the Luofu this time?

122290001.text: Of course I do! To witness you becoming the Express' greatest sword master!

122290002.text: That was important, too! But that was not our original reason, was it?

122290003.text: We came to take part in the Wardance, didn't we?

122290004.text: That's right! If I hadn't asked, you'd have forgotten!

122290005.text: We originally came as VIP guests to take part in the Wardance! Then, as expected, we ran into accidents!

122290006.text: We successfully captured Hoolay on the Skysplitter and General Jing Yuan decided to formally hold the Wardance for real

122290007.text: I have two Masters that got me nice benefits, so I've managed to get two staff passes for you and Dan Heng. You can come straight to the Skysplitter backstage without any trouble!

122290008.text: I'm amazing, right? Where is my praise?

122290009.text: Thank you, Super-March! I knew I could count on you!

122290010.text: You're the best! Dan Heng was so frosty. All he said was something about: "One should maintain a proper distance from contestants when spectating sports..." Such a buzz kill~

122290011.text: What's so good about going backstage? I feel like spectators should keep their distance from competitors

122290012.text: That's weird. That's pretty much what Dan Heng said... But you'll be able to see all kinds of things backstage that you won't see anywhere else! You know the Xianzhou saying: "A minute on stage is ten years of hard work offstage!"

122290013.text: Forget it. I don't care if you two come or not! Humph!

122290014.text: I'm going back to training. Chat later!
